week_metadata.title: Linear Algebra - The Language of AI
week_metadata.subtitle: Master the mathematical foundation that powers all machine learning
week_metadata.description: Discover how vectors and matrices form the fundamental language of artificial intelligence. From Google's PageRank algorithm to neural network operations, linear algebra is the mathematical engine that makes AI possible.
learning_objectives: Understand vectors and matrices as geometric transformations
Master fundamental operations: addition, multiplication, transpose
Visualize eigenvalues and eigenvectors as natural directions
Apply linear algebra to real problems: PageRank, data analysis
Build geometric intuition for machine learning foundations
week_metadata.historical_context: Linear algebra emerged from solving systems of equations in the 1800s. Today, every AI system relies on these mathematical tools - from neural networks to computer vision.
week_metadata.motivation: Google's $1 trillion valuation started with one linear algebra concept: eigenvalues. Every image you see, every recommendation you receive, every AI breakthrough - it all starts here.

math.title: Mathematical Deep Dive
math.description: Build deep mathematical understanding of linear algebra concepts
learning_outcomes: Understand vector spaces and linear transformations
Master matrix operations and their geometric meaning
Connect linear algebra to machine learning algorithms

coding.title: Implementation Practice
coding.description: Implement linear algebra operations from scratch to understand computational aspects
learning_outcomes: Build linear regression using normal equation

real_applications.title: Real-World Applications

real_applications.description: Apply linear algebra to solve real problems and understand industry applications
